languages.text: "Вероятно. Но без понимания что это за ловушка и какова ее цель у нас нет версии, только предостережение".
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно. Но без понимания что это за ловушка и какова ее цель у нас нет версии, только предостережение".

traits.locale_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have no theories and can only stay alert."
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have no theories and can only stay alert."
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have no theories and can only stay on our guard."
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have no theories and can only stay on our guard."
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."
"Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

languages.text: "Vermutlich. Aber solange wir Wesen und Zweck dieser Falle nicht kennen, haben wir keine konkreten Anhaltspunkte und können nur weiter wachsam bleiben."
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: "Vermutlich. Aber solange wir Wesen und Zweck dieser Falle nicht kennen, haben wir keine konkreten Anhaltspunkte und können nur weiter wachsam bleiben."

languages.text: « C'est probable, mais tant que nous ignorons la nature et le but de ce piège, nous n'avons aucun élément concret sur lequel nous appuyer et devons donc nous contenter de rester sur nos gardes. »
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: « C'est probable, mais tant que nous ignorons la nature et le but de ce piège, nous n'avons aucun élément concret sur lequel nous appuyer et devons donc nous contenter de rester sur nos gardes. »

languages.text: 「おそらくそうでしょう。ですが、罠の性質や目的がわからない以上、確かな手がかりは何もありません。ただ警戒を怠らずにいるしかないのです」
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくそうでしょう。ですが、罠の性質や目的がわからない以上、確かな手がかりは何もありません。ただ警戒を怠らずにいるしかないのです」

languages.text: «Es probable, pero mientras no conozcamos la naturaleza y el motivo de la trampa, no hay nada concreto que podamos hacer y tendremos que mantenernos en guardia».
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: «Es probable, pero mientras no conozcamos la naturaleza y el motivo de la trampa, no hay nada concreto que podamos hacer y tendremos que mantenernos en guardia».

languages.text: “很有可能。不过，考虑到我们对这个陷阱的性质与目的一无所知，我们也没有具体的应对手段，只能保持警惕。”
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: “很有可能。不过，考虑到我们对这个陷阱的性质与目的一无所知，我们也没有具体的应对手段，只能保持警惕。”

languages.text: "Muhtemelen. Bu tuzağın nasıl ve neden kurgulandığını henüz bilmiyoruz, elimizde de somut bir delil yok. Tek yapabileceğimiz, tetikte olmak."
languages.original_text: "Likely so. But while we are ignorant as to the nature and purpose of this trap, we have nothing concrete to go on and can only stay on our guard."

traits.locale_text: "Muhtemelen. Bu tuzağın nasıl ve neden kurgulandığını henüz bilmiyoruz, elimizde de somut bir delil yok. Tek yapabileceğimiz, tetikte olmak."
